title: ISA Sample Description
description: Definitions for elements that appear in different stages of a wizard for describing isa samples. 'ref', id of stage; 'title',  header used for the stage; 'content', the function to call to generate stage html; items, actual form elements on the page; 'is_stage_stub', if the stage entry is a complete stage or a bootstrap; 'is_conditional_stage', displays a stage based on some condition being satisfied; 'is_singular_stage', if all items must have same value for this stage
